projects.name: Perfect Personnell Project
projects.description: The Serverless Training planner is a serverless mobile app that Revature managers can use to look at important information regarding clientele demands and batch output for the company. This service visualizes all current batches planned along with any associated information. It also visualizes that batch output alongside the client demand for associates. Managers may input information for clients, their demands, and batches which consist of a curriculum composed of skills, the number of associates, a trainer, and the dates for the batch. This service helps ease the management of supply and demand for the company and is an organizational aid.

projects.name: ToDoApp
projects.description: A Simple Application that records items into a todo list. These items can be marked completed and removed. It utilizes a Node.js Express backend to connnect to a MySqul instance. Access information is stored in Enviroment variables.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A website built to display my portfolio. It is built from scratch using React, Typescript, and SCSS
